div.h2: WELCOME TO EDINBURGH COMMUNITY SCHOOL CORPORATION

p.span: Edinburgh Community Schools would like to welcome you to our brand new website! Feel free to explore the new web space by checking out some of our new features including: calendars, news, and blogs. Subscribe to our Facebook, Twitter, or RSS feeds to receive updates on school and district information!

div.a: Read More About COVID 19 Memo April 2020
Read More About eLearning Calendar Days
Read More About COVID-19 Meal Plan

div.p: On behalf of the Edinburgh Schools’ Board of School Trustees, Administrative Team, and staff I would like to welcome all of our students, parents, and community members to the 2019-20 school year.

This past fall, 2018, the Edinburgh Board of School Trustees and Administrative Team developed a new Strategic Plan. This includes our mission, vision, and goals.
Mission:
Empowering and encouraging all students through Education.
Vision:
The Edinburgh Community Schools are a place that students and parents choose due to our small town, personal, caring, safe and secure environment. The town of Edinburgh and the Edinburgh Community Schools share a nearly two-hundred-year history where community pride and school spirit are deeply rooted. The Edinburgh Community Schools are leaders in technology which is integrated throughout the curriculum to ensure every student develops 21st Century Skills to compete in a globalized world. As we strive to satisfy increasingly high expectations, we recognize that we cannot be solely satisfied with past successes and “rest on our laurels.” The faculty and staff of the Edinburgh Community Schools work diligently to meet increasingly rigorous state standards in a fiscally responsible fashion while striving to exceed the educational needs of every student, every day. Edinburgh Community Schools—Choose Us!
Goals:

ul.li: Develop a sustainable program for school spirit and develop community pride/involvement
Know every student and exceed every student’s needs
Develop a program of sustained fiscal responsibility

div.p:
I am looking forward to a really exciting 2019-20 school year in which we are “Empowering and encouraging all students through Education.”
Best Wishes,
Dr. Doug Arnold
Superintendent of Schools

a.title: Link to the employment opportunities page
Link to the employment opportunities page

div.p: Edinburgh Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Edinburgh Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
